title: National Oilwell Varco, Inc. (NOV) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: National Oilwell Varco, Inc. ( NOV  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.05 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 27, 2019.
